description: This file defines a CategorizationService class that performs rule-based categorization of documents based on their title and OCR extracted text. It uses simple keyword matching to classify documents into categories like invoice, receipt, tax, legal, or uncategorized.

classes.name: CategorizationService
classes.description: A service class implementing rule-based document categorization based on keywords in the combined title and OCR text.

methods.name: Optional[str] categorize(self, title: str, ocr_text: str)
methods.description: Method that takes a document title and OCR text, and returns a categorical label based on keyword matching.

ctags.name: categorize
ctags.pattern: /^    def categorize(self, title: str, ocr_text: str) -> Optional[str]:$/
